content: How can we enhance the accuracy of calculating the average population of villages with diverse sizes that go beyond the data available for VillageA, VillageB, and VillageC with populations of 100, 50, and 200, respectively? Can you construct a more advanced MATLAB algorithm that can determine the average population of any village according to its size, age distribution, and employment rate? Please include the necessary input data and MATLAB code for this computation. Moreover, can you introduce additional parameters such as income distribution and educational level to further improve the precision of the estimation?
